fields.title: Fix Login Bug
fields.description: Users are unable to log in with Google authentication.

fields.title: Update Documentation
fields.description: The API documentation needs to be updated for version 2.0.

fields.title: Optimize Database Queries
fields.description: Improve the performance of the report generation module.

fields.title: Redesign Landing Page
fields.description: Create a new design for the main landing page using Tailwind CSS.

fields.title: Implement Dark Mode Feature
fields.description: Users have requested a dark mode theme for better readability at night. The implementation should include a toggle switch in the settings page and ensure that colors are optimized for accessibility.

fields.title: Refactor Payment Processing Module
fields.description: The current payment processing system is experiencing delays during peak hours. Refactor the code to improve performance and ensure transactions are logged correctly for auditing purposes.

fields.title: Create Automated Testing for User Authentication
fields.description: Our authentication system needs more test coverage. Write unit and integration tests using pytest and Djangoâ€™s built-in test framework to ensure login, registration, and password reset functionalities work reliably.

fields.title: Migrate Database from SQLite to PostgreSQL
fields.description: To support increased traffic and ensure better scalability, migrate the database from SQLite to PostgreSQL. Update all connection settings and test for potential data inconsistencies before deployment.

fields.title: Enhance API Security with JWT Authentication
fields.description: Currently, our API uses basic authentication, which is not secure for production. Implement JWT-based authentication to enhance security and ensure safe user sessions.

fields.title: Optimize Frontend Performance
fields.description: The website loads slowly on mobile devices due to large image assets and inefficient scripts. Optimize image loading, reduce unnecessary JavaScript, and improve overall performance using lazy loading and code splitting.

fields.content: I started investigating the issue. It seems related to OAuth permissions.
I'll begin updating the documentation tomorrow.
Analyzing the slow queries right now.
The redesign has been completed and deployed!
Okay John, please make sure to solve it before April 15th
I've started working on the UI for the dark mode toggle. Need to finalize color palette.
Analyzing current payment processing bottlenecks. Initial tests show slowdowns due to database locks.
Writing initial test cases for login functionality. Will proceed with registration tests next.
JWT implementation is halfway done. Need to update the frontend to handle token storage properly.
Started optimizing scripts. Also investigating impact of third-party libraries on page load speed.
Migration was successful! Database is now running on PostgreSQL with no data loss.
